name: THE SOUL OF TOO BIRDS GAME
name_original: THE SOUL OF TOO BIRDS GAME
description:
THE SOUL OF TOO BIRDS GAME.

An interactive experience designed to accompany Melbourne experimental hip hop group Too Birds' 2023 album, The Soul of Too Birds. This interactive multimedia companion piece mutates Too Birds' chaotic, noisy soundscapes and opaque lyrics into otherworldly labrinyths where you are given but one objective: destroy the paintings and ultimately, free the soul.

Drawing inspiration from an esoteric mix of influences, Too Birds' brutal and cryptic sound blends elements of harsh noise, hip-hop, and industrial metal to create a relentless auditory deluge. Too Birds personnel Teether, Realname, and Mr. Society concoct a musical experience that pushes the envelope in all directions.



Now, you might be wondering, "what features and content can I expect from this game?". Well, there are many features and contents within this game. Here is a list of the game's features and contents:
- Exist in a world.
- Move around, said world.
- Look at things.
- Destroy paintings with your powerful hands.
- Listen to the album The Soul of Too Birds.
